PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-01682021-03-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TBS,  OAG
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Deloitte LLP of Montréal, Québec, as the Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder appointing (a) Deloitte LLP of Montréal, Québec, as the AUDITOR of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2021; and (b) the Auditor General of Canada as JOINT AUDITOR of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Appointment of Deloitte LLP of Montréal, Québec, as the Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of Public Sector Pension Investment Board
precis: Order appointing (a) Deloitte LLP of Montréal, Québec, as the AUDITOR of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2021; and (b) the Auditor General of Canada as JOINT AUDITOR of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2021.
